Package org.supercsv.io

The IO package contains various reader/writers for reading/writing strings, maps or objects (POJO beans).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ICsvBeanReader Supertype for readers reading into objects/beans.
ICsvBeanWriter Supertype for all writers writing using beans
ICsvListReader Supertype for readers reading into lists.
ICsvListWriter Supertype for all writers using lists
ICsvMapReader The supertype for MapReaders.
ICsvMapWriter This is a supertype for writers writing maps
ICsvWriter Super Type for all csv writers.
ITokenizer The tokenizer is an internal mechanism to the csv parser
 

Class Summary
AbstractCsvReader This is a set of functionality used across the various readers
AbstractCsvWriter The writer class capable of writing arrays, maps,... to a CSV file.
CsvBeanReader This class reads a line from a csv file, instantiates a bean and populate its fields.
CsvBeanWriter This class capable of writing beans to a CSV file.
CsvListReader A simple reader, reading a line from a CSV file into a List.
CsvListWriter The writer class capable of writing arrays and lists to a CSV file.
CsvMapReader Map readers are capable of reading CSV files and populate map instances of a multiple types.
CsvMapWriter The writer class capable of writing maps of different types to a CSV file.
Tokenizer The tokenizer is an internal mechanism to the csv parser
 

Package org.supercsv.io Description

The IO package contains various reader/writers for reading/writing strings, maps or objects (POJO beans). In order to use a reader/writer it should be configured with a set of CellProcessor's and a CSVPreference.
